Title: particleMDI: A julia package for the integrative cluster analysis of multiple datasets
Abstract: © 2019, Springer Nature Switzerland AG.We present particleMDI, a Julia package for performing integrative cluster analysis on multiple heterogeneous data sets, built within the framework of multiple data integration (MDI). particleMDI updates cluster allocations using a particle Gibbs approach which offers better mixing of the MCMC chain—but at greater computational cost—than the original MDI algorithm. We outline approaches for improving computational performance, finding the potential for greater than an order-of-magnitude improvement. We demonstrate the capability of particleMDI to uncovering the ground truth in simulated and real datasets. All files are available at https://github.com/nathancunn/particleMDI.jl.
